title: If only Worlds has a 14 week Groups stage, TSM cud had adapted LMAO
body:
oh shittttt I've done it again

LOL {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body: TSM goes in thinking they are some cocky people (esp Doublelift) and then gets curbed, which makes them too scared to do anything.
DL wasn't scared though. The problem was Sven and Bjerg playing minecraft.

Nah, TSM loses due to a mental issue (not challenge).

They are literally SCARED to play (except DL). And I don't think 14 weeks would change that, they would just be scared for 12 weeks of, what if I look bad better turtle (not the wild kind). 
They aren't coming in to challenge. It is like, they always win NA so they have pride to protect. When they need to play like MSF and go for the win.

But I know this is a sarcasm thread.
I think even TSM fans realize they aren't a international team now.
